data.title: Great for Noodle-Lovers!
data.text: This place has great noodles.  They are not your typical noodles, but it tastes great and the drinks are good too.

data.title: Good food and vegetarian
data.text: If I remember correctly, this place offered vegetarian food that's very tasty in a small, quaint and quiet environment. A good place for veggie lovers and if you just want a peaceful environment to eat with decent service. I recommend this place just to try it out. you may like it or you may not come back. It's up to your tastebuds.

data.title: Great taste, great food, great prices!
data.text: They make their own noodles, and the simple menu offered is delicious and a terrific value.  I will return frequently!

data.title: Turkey Swiss with Avocado
data.text: I order the Turkey Swiss Avocado when I come here. Food is pretty decent. Although quality of food and service has both gone down recently. The wait can be long. Their green tea frap is pretty good. Overall, it's an okay place for sandwich, just be ready for the wait.
